title: How to Buy Everything You Need for Your Doll

steps.headline: Make a checklist or a shopping list of what you need to buy for a doll.
steps.description: You might like to keep this list so that you can check off items over time, as you have money available to buy new items.

steps.headline: Follow the examples offered here.
steps.description: Here are some things you might want to consider to buy for your doll:

steps.description: Friends for the dolls (other dolls, other toys) Decorations Books or magazines.

steps.headline: Ask your parents to come shopping with you when you buy all the stuff for your doll!
If you want to take your doll on trips then make sure you buy a little bag to keep all the things they definitely need and a bigger bag for all their clothes.
Remember to look after your doll.

text:
Buying things for your doll Make a checklist or a shopping list of what you need to buy for a doll. You might like to keep this list so that you can check off items over time, as you have money available to buy new items. Follow the examples offered here. "} Friends for the dolls (other dolls, other toys) Decorations Books or magazines. Getting the things Ask your parents to come shopping with you when you buy all the stuff for your doll! If you want to take your doll on trips then make sure you buy a little bag to keep all the things they definitely need and a bigger bag for all their clothes. Remember to look after your doll.
